sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_542b95954f20320023bf3879b110c743
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_update_set">stateVALCHANGES^stateCHANGESTOcomplete^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="complete"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Automate test cases</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var AtfUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_atf_test');
	AtfUpdateSet.addQuery('u_update_sets', current.name);
	AtfUpdateSet.query();
	while(AtfUpdateSet.next()) {
		var testcaseSys_Id = AtfUpdateSet.sys_id;
		//gs.log('##### Test AFT #####' +AtfUpdateSet.name);
		var callrunUserTest = new TestExecutorAjax(); //Calling SI TestExecutorAjax
		callrunUserTest.runUserTest(testcaseSys_Id); //Procesing function runUserTest
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-25 06:57:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>542b95954f20320023bf3879b110c743</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Automate test cases</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_542b95954f20320023bf3879b110c743</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-27 10:12:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=542b95954f20320023bf3879b110c743"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_test"><sys_atf_test action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Emergency change approver check</description><name>Emergency change approver check</name><remember/><sys_class_name>sys_atf_test</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-25 09:52:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>149ace514fa0320023bf3879b110c7e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Emergency change approver check</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_test_149ace514fa0320023bf3879b110c7e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-27 08:10:31</sys_updated_on><u_update_sets>ATF demo update set</u_update_sets></sys_atf_test><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=149ace514fa0320023bf3879b110c7e7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_atf_step_0cbc4e514fa0320023bf3879b110c75a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><order>2</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-25 10:06:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0cbc4e514fa0320023bf3879b110c75a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_0cbc4e514fa0320023bf3879b110c75a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-27 08:07:34</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="Emergency change approver check">149ace514fa0320023bf3879b110c7e7</test><timeout/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=0cbc4e514fa0320023bf3879b110c75a"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>0cbc4e514fa0320023bf3879b110c75a</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-25 10:06:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>93fd06914fa0320023bf3879b110c7ee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-27 08:07:34</sys_updated_on><value>(function(steps, outputs, stepResult, describe, assertEqual) {
	var chgApprover = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
	chgApprover.addQuery('short_description', 'CONTAINS', 'ATF Test');
	chgApprover.addQuery('assignment_group', '287ee6fea9fe198100ada7950d0b1b73');
	chgApprover.query();
	if(chgApprover.next()) {
		stepResult.setOutputMessage("Successfully validated the record");
		return true; // pass the step
	}
	else {
		stepResult.setOutputMessage("Record could not be found");
		return false; // fail the step
	}
	
})(steps, outputs, stepResult, describe, assertEqual);
</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">stateVALCHANGES^stateCHANGESTO2^type=Emergency^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="2"/><item endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Emergency"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ATF - Creating a change</name><order>103</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var chgApprover = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_group');
	chgApprover.initialize();
	chgApprover.setValue('assignment_group', '287ee6fea9fe198100ada7950d0b1b73');
	chgApprover.setValue('parent', current.sys_id);
	chgApprover.setValue('short_description', 'ATF Test');
	chgApprover.insert();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-25 09:15:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>972002110fe87200f59c47ace1050ef6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ATF - Creating a change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_972002110fe87200f59c47ace1050ef6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-27 08:05:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=972002110fe87200f59c47ace1050ef6"/></record_update>
